alert.note: Alert for Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 5:10PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN LEON COUNTY THROUGH 600 PM EDT... At 510 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles northeast of Tallahassee, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Ralford Greenway, Macon Community Park, Miccosukee Road Greenway, Lake Iamonia, Baum, Maclay State Gardens, Killearn Lakes, Miccosukee, Capitola, St. Marks Headwaters Greenway, Killearn Estates, Chaires, Market District, Bradfordville, Winthrop Park, Forest Meadows Park, and Pisgah Church. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
